Class PetOverlay

java.lang.Object
PetOverlay
public class PetOverlay extends Object
Represents the class that contains the pet UI, including the pet's states.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PetOverlay()
    Creates a new PetOverlay.

  • Constructor Details

    • PetOverlay

      public PetOverlay()
      Creates a new PetOverlay.

      This overlay displays the pet's sprite and manages its animation.

  • Method Details

    • buildPet

      public void buildPet(Pet pet)
      Constructs the pet's sprites using the sprite manager class. Different sprites are used for different pet types.
      Parameters:
      pet - The pet object to be displayed in the overlay.

    • addToRoot

      public void addToRoot(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane parentRoot)
      Adds the overlay to the gameplay screens.
      Parameters:
      parentRoot - The parent root to which the overlay will be added.

    • getRoot

      public javafx.scene.layout.StackPane getRoot()
      Returns the root of this overlay.
      Returns:
      The root of this overlay.

    • updateScaling

      public void updateScaling(double width, double height)
      Updates the scaling of the sprite based on the screen size.
      Parameters:
      width - the width of the screen
      height - the height of the screen

    • startAnimation

      public void startAnimation()
      Starts the sprite's animation. Used when the gameplay screens are active.

    • stopAnimation

      public void stopAnimation()
      Stops the sprite's animation.

    • setSpriteFrame

      public void setSpriteFrame(int frameIndex)
      Sets the sprite's current frame.

    • getSpriteManager

      public SpriteManager getSpriteManager()
      Returns the sprite manager for this overlay.
      Returns:
      The sprite manager for this overlay.
